hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: Looking for reliable home repair services? Contact Mark Repair Services today for a free estimate and professional support. Your home deserves quality care.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: Reach out to us through any of the following channels. We're here to help!

form.title: Request a Service
form.description: Fill out the form below and our team will contact you quickly to schedule your service.

successMessage.title: Thank You!
successMessage.description: Your service request has been submitted successfully. Our team will contact you within 24 hours to discuss your needs and schedule a free estimate.

questions.question: How quickly can you respond to a service request?
questions.answer: For standard requests, we typically respond within 24 hours and can schedule service within 1-3 business days. For emergencies, we offer same-day service with response times under 1 hour.

questions.question: Do you provide free estimates?
questions.answer: Yes! We provide free, no-obligation estimates for all our services. Our team will assess your needs and provide transparent pricing before any work begins.

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We currently serve major metropolitan areas in Texas (Houston, Dallas, Austin, San Antonio) and Florida (Miami, Tampa, Orlando, Jacksonville). Contact us to confirm service availability in your specific location.

questions.question: Are your technicians licensed and insured?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All our technicians are fully licensed, insured, and undergo thorough background checks. We maintain all required certifications for the services we provide.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, checks, and cash. For larger projects, we also offer financing options to help make your home improvements more affordable.
